concept.title: Insert Image Action
concept.shortdesc: The insert image tool is depicted by a yellow frame.

section.p: When pressed, a dialog is presented to choose the location of an Image. On pressing OK, the image is inserted in to the SVG Canvas

Clicking advanced and expanding the advanced options allow you to choose a custom size for the image. Or, if an element is selected before clicking the insert image item then "Fit Selected Element" can be chosen, this will shrink or grow the image to the size of the element that was selected; this is useful for when the image is the background or a shape, or will be grouped with a shape. In these advanced options, an image position can also be specified.

For an image to show correctly on the SVG, a path is needed for the xlink:href attribute; for this an absolute path is not used, as this only work on a single system. Therefore Beermat calculates a relative path between the location of the SVG and the Image, meaning this image path will work on any system, should the directory hierarchy remain intact and the image exists.
